Description: Steatite figure of Taweret originally with a bronze headdress(of which only corrosion product remains); incised detail; much of the leg section has broken away.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1998/9 Oct-Jun, South Carolina, The Charleston Museum, Queens Commoners of the New Kingdom
Condition: incomplete - headdress and much of legs missing
Acquisition name: Purchased from: R J Moss & Co
